metadata.title: CVE-2023-23004 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel before 5.19, drivers/gpu/drm/arm/malidp_planes.cmisinterprets the get_sg_table return value (expects it to be NULL in theerror case, whereas it is actually an error pointer).

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
